text: Dangshi, wo yu yiselie de houyi diyue, shuo:“Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai zhenzhu, bing dang xiaojing fumu, hemu qinqi, lianxu gu'er, zhenji pinmin, dui ren shuo shan yan, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke.” Ranhou, nimen chu shaoshu ren wai, dou weibei yue yan, nimen shi changchang shuangyue de
